flashes.name: Falling Snow
flashes.description: A particle simulation with effects based on cursor position. Click to alternate between an attractive and a repulsive force.

flashes.name: Heart
flashes.description: A perspective approximation using affine transformations on a shape based on cursor position.

flashes.name: Machine Music
flashes.description: An experiment on embedding note data in a flash and synchronizing it with music.

flashes.name: Pixel Ripples
flashes.description: An experiment on shading static pixels to form images, rather than transforming shapes.

flashes.name: Left And Right
flashes.description: An experiment with audio-generated and tempo-synced visuals.

flashes.name: Mode 7
flashes.description: An implementation of a rendering system most commonly known as "mode 7," referring to its use in the Super NES.

flashes.name: Seaside Scene
flashes.description: A clock with embedded audio and internet radio capabilities. Art by 1041uuu.

flashes.name: Headcase
flashes.description: A test of basing visuals on an audio waveform and its corresponding fourier transform data. Music by Headcase.

flashes.name: Forgotten Place
flashes.description: An early test of independently looping audio and visuals. Art from 5734l3r, music by Zinovia.

flashes.name: Seven Seas
flashes.description: A simple visualization based on album art. Music and art by Simple Machines.
